column2: everything feels tiring lately, it's not been a good day
column4: I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. Some days really do feel harder than others. Be gentle with yourself today. You're doing your best, and that's more than enough.

column2: it was a horrid day today, barely made it through
column4: That sounds really tough. It takes strength to make it through a hard day like that. Try to rest tonight—you deserve it.

column2: i don't know, it was like i was floating on a cloud, everything felt amazing
column4: Wow, what a beautiful feeling! I’m so glad you had such a light and uplifting day. Try to hold on to that magic a little longer.

column2: it was okay, neither good nor bad
column4: It sounds like today was kind of neutral. That's totally okay—those kinds of days can offer rest and balance. I hope tomorrow brings more clarity.

column2: hi my mood is awesome today
column4: That's fantastic! I love to hear that. Hope the day keeps treating you well. What’s been the highlight so far?
Short and sweet—sounds like a good day! Wishing you more of these uplifting moments.
Yay! I’m so happy to hear that. Amazing days deserve to be celebrated. Anything in particular that made it special?

column2: you know it was the worst day of my life
column4: That sounds incredibly painful. I’m really sorry you had to go through such a hard day. You don’t have to carry it alone—I’m here if you want to talk.
That's wonderful! It's great to hear that things went so well. Keep that joy going!
It sounds like you really had a rough time. I’m here for you. Even if it was just one word, it says a lot. Want to share more?
Bad days are so hard. I hope you can give yourself some rest and kindness today. You deserve care, especially on the hard days.

column2: horrible day, my brain has stopped working
column4: It’s okay to feel overwhelmed, especially when nothing seems to work. Let yourself slow down. You’ve made it through the day, and that’s enough.
That’s so fun to hear! Sounds like you had a blast today. I’d love to know what made it so good!
Wow, a perfect day! That’s beautiful. So glad you got to experience something so fulfilling. Tell me more if you'd like!

column2: it’s been a really sucky day, can't seem to get anything done
column4: Ugh, I totally get how draining that can feel. You don’t have to be productive every day. Be gentle with yourself—you’re human, not a machine.

column2: today was the most awesome day of my life, just amazing
column4: That’s incredible! I’m so thrilled for you. Tell me everything—what made it so awesome?
Those 'meh' days happen too. Sometimes just coasting is all we need. Hopefully tomorrow brings a spark!
Sounds like it was one of those frustrating days where nothing feels right. It’s okay to feel annoyed—let it out. You’re allowed to feel this way.
That’s such a peaceful place to be—tired but satisfied. I hope you get some well-deserved rest tonight.
That's good to hear!  Just a simple "good" sometimes says it all.  Hope the rest of your day is equally pleasant.
